title: Culturebots and AnneDroid Brontës
notes:
Etherpad: Culturebots and AnneDroid Brontes

Housekeeping

*This session is not in the Mezzanine Room, it is in the space immediately behind the Arts and Culture welcome desk on the 1st floor*

Any questions? You can reach me on Twitter @mentionthewar

Useful links

https://www.pythonanywhere.com/
https://github.com/mentionthewar/AndroidBrontes

Tweepy documentation - http://docs.tweepy.org/en/v3.5.0/api.html#api-reference
England's Immigrants 1330-1550 data https://github.com/mentionthewar/EnglandsImmigrants

Bots

Some examples at https://twitter.com/mentionthewar/lists/bots/members

Two favourites would be Magic Realism Bot (https://twitter.com/MagicRealismBot) and Census Americans (https://twitter.com/censusamericans)

Bonus bot: Beyoncéchain (https://twitter.com/blkchninstitute) takes tweets about blockchain and replaces them with tweets about Beyonce - obviously.

Tutorial

Twitter setup
1. Log into your Twitter account and go to https://apps.twitter.com/
2. Create a new app (specify http://www.madeupurl.com for the url and leave the other field blank.
3. Go to the keys and access tokens tab. Scroll down and hit the ‘generate token’ button.
4. Hang on to these details

Code setup
5. Create PythonAnywhere account via https://www.pythonanywhere.com/
6. Get files from github via https://github.com/mentionthewar/AndroidBrontes 
7. Upload files to Python anywhere
8. Edit python code in twitter-bot-v3.py:
		* Select your Bronte sister (a-liners, c-liners or e-liners)
		* Change sleep time to 600 (bot will now tweet every 10 minutes)
9. Edit keys.py to fill in details from #4 above

If you have any particular favourite bots please do share them here.

Clitoscope - a Twitter bot promoting cliteracy
https://twitter.com/clitoscope

Sunny Day 4PM - a bot making ice cream illustrations
https://twitter.com/sunnyday4pm

Magical Realism Bot
https://twitter.com/MagicRealismBot
